title: Meddler thinks karthus having a 10% pick rate makes him a "rare pick" so he doesnt need nerfs yet
body: Good one lol, off to abuse karthus for freelo.

replies.body: He is getting nerfed. DH is got nerfed and is getting more. You don't have to make direct changes to a champion to nerf them. Like if you nerf {{item:3147}} you are nerfing {{champion:238}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:35}} etc even though you aren't directly nerfing them
he doesnt need nerfs in general its dark harvest

They just massively nerfed Dark Harvest.

You know, the reason why Karthus is the way he is presently?
Ezreal gets buffed every patch. Yasuo still broken. Master Yi 12% Play Rate in high elo Korea, but Karthus gets indirectly buffed and everybody is crying.

Karthus should allowed to be viable and popular. 

Every champ should have that opportunity.

He is not in way easy to play come on I can sidestep that q so easy

Good grief these forums. Karth has been strong for 1 patch. ONE. Calm down, they have not even had the opportunity to nerf him yet. And he is only strong cuz DH is strong on him. And they have already hotfixed it and have more nerfs  planned for next patch. So no reason to nerf Karthus until they see the result. Stop acting like Riot doesnt care because a champ got strong for a patch.
